content: this is a summary of a legal text about a case in the district court in ljubljana the case involves the payment of costs and started on november 11 2013 ending on october 9 2015 the final resolution divides goods worth 135000 eur between the exspouses the plaintiff will receive 35000 eur securities shares and cash from a bank account the defendant will receive 12 of the joint investments a portion of securities shares and cash from a bank account the decision is based on the civil procedure act specifically section 306 the details of the court settlement are confidential and there is no available translation of the document
